name: Richard Kozak
seeking: Richard Kozak at RichBrands is seeking JV partners who serve entrepreneurs and business owners needing brand development or marketing strategy services. Partners running business coaching programs, mastermind groups, or startup accelerators could refer clients who lack clear brand identity. Cross-promotional arrangements with business consultants or digital marketing specialists would extend reach into RichBrands' core target market.
who_you_serve: Businesses and entrepreneurs needing brand development and marketing strategy.
what_you_do: Works as Brand Architect and Marketing Strategist at RichBrands, helping businesses develop branding strategies.
offering: Brand architecture and marketing strategy development for businesses and entrepreneurs
signature_programs: 7-STEP process for brand development, Branding YOU With IMPACT event
service_provided: 1:1 coaching, group programs, courses, speaking, consulting
social_proof: Best-selling author, Certified Global Branding Consultant, former board member of the American Marketing Association International.
bio: Best-selling author, Certified Global Branding Consultant, former board member of the American Marketing Association International.
business_focus: Works as Brand Architect and Marketing Strategist at RichBrands, helping businesses develop branding strategies.
